articles.author: Justine Calma
articles.title: NASA’s TEMPO launches to monitor air pollution in North America - The Verge
articles.description: For the first time, NASA will be able to take hourly air pollution readings from space thanks to a new tool called TEMPO.
articles.content:
NASAs powerful new air quality monitor has launched into space
NASAs powerful new air quality monitor has launched into space
